DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study assess safety tolerability ascend single multiple oral dos SAM-531 healthy subject
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Single Multiple Dose SAM-531
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Body mass index range 18 30 kg/m2 body weight great equal 50 kg . Body weight elderly subject must great equal 45 kg . history , physical examination finding , clinical laboratory test result , vital sign measurement , digital 12lead ECG reading . Exclusion criterion : Presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study . Any significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal ( GI ) , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic psychiatric disease .
